languages.text: {n}Проктор и его кибермастиф излучают стальную уверенность — оба подобны живому воплощению долга и порядка.{/n} "Доктрина Адептус Арбитес велит отринуть сомнения и страх ради службы, так что вы не увидите и капли преступных колебаний. Я готов нести правосудие Императора в самое сердце тьмы".

{n}Solomorne and Glaito exude steely confidence — both akin to living embodiments of duty and order.{/n} "The doctrine of the Adeptus Arbites commands that I cast aside doubt and fear for the sake of service, so you won't see even a hint of such criminal hesitation from me. I am ready to carry the Emperor's justice into the heart of darkness."
languages.original_text: {n}Проктор и его кибермастиф излучают стальную уверенность — оба подобны живому воплощению долга и порядка.{/n} "Доктрина Адептус Арбитес велит отринуть сомнения и страх ради службы, так что вы не увидите и капли преступных колебаний. Я готов нести правосудие Императора в самое сердце тьмы".

I am ready to carry the Emperor's justice into the heart of darkness."

I am ready to carry the Emperor's justice into the heart of darkness."

{n}Solomorne and Glaito exude steely confidence — both akin to living embodiments of duty and order.{/n} "The doctrine of the Adeptus Arbites commands that I cast aside doubt and fear for the sake of service, so you won't see even a hint of such criminal hesitation from me. languages.text: {n}ソロモーンとグライトには鋼のような自信がみなぎっている。まさに義務と秩序を体現する存在だ。{/n}「高等裁定局の理念は、奉仕のために疑念と恐怖を捨て去ることを命じています。ですから私からは犯罪的なためらいの気配すら感じることはないでしょう。皇帝の正義を、闇の奥深くへと運ぶ覚悟はできています」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne and Glaito exude steely confidence — both akin to living embodiments of duty and order.{/n} "The doctrine of the Adeptus Arbites commands that I cast aside doubt and fear for the sake of service, so you won't see even a hint of such criminal hesitation from me. I am ready to carry the Emperor's justice into the heart of darkness."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンとグライトには鋼のような自信がみなぎっている。まさに義務と秩序を体現する存在だ。{/n}「高等裁定局の理念は、奉仕のために疑念と恐怖を捨て去ることを命じています。ですから私からは犯罪的なためらいの気配すら感じることはないでしょう。皇帝の正義を、闇の奥深くへと運ぶ覚悟はできています」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne und Glaito strahlen unerschütterliches Selbstvertrauen aus – beide sind lebende Verkörperungen von Pflicht und Ordnung.{/n} "Die Doktrin des Adeptus Arbites befiehlt, dass ich ohne Zweifel und Furcht diene, Ihr werdet also von mir keinen Hauch derart kriminellen Zögerns sehen. Ich bin bereit, die Gerechtigkeit des Imperators ins Herz der Finsternis zu tragen."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne and Glaito exude steely confidence — both akin to living embodiments of duty and order.{/n} "The doctrine of the Adeptus Arbites commands that I cast aside doubt and fear for the sake of service, so you won't see even a hint of such criminal hesitation from me. I am ready to carry the Emperor's justice into the heart of darkness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne und Glaito strahlen unerschütterliches Selbstvertrauen aus – beide sind lebende Verkörperungen von Pflicht und Ordnung.{/n} "Die Doktrin des Adeptus Arbites befiehlt, dass ich ohne Zweifel und Furcht diene, Ihr werdet also von mir keinen Hauch derart kriminellen Zögerns sehen. Ich bin bereit, die Gerechtigkeit des Imperators ins Herz der Finsternis zu tragen."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne et Glaito affichent une assurance inébranlable, celle propre aux individus incarnant à la perfection le devoir et l'ordre.{/n} « La doctrine de l'Adeptus Arbites m'impose de me défaire de toute trace de doute ou de peur lors de l'exercice de mes fonctions, vous ne décèlerez donc jamais de cette hésitation criminelle en moi. Je suis prêt à administrer la justice de l'Empereur au cœur des ténèbres. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne and Glaito exude steely confidence — both akin to living embodiments of duty and order.{/n} "The doctrine of the Adeptus Arbites commands that I cast aside doubt and fear for the sake of service, so you won't see even a hint of such criminal hesitation from me. I am ready to carry the Emperor's justice into the heart of darkness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne et Glaito affichent une assurance inébranlable, celle propre aux individus incarnant à la perfection le devoir et l'ordre.{/n} « La doctrine de l'Adeptus Arbites m'impose de me défaire de toute trace de doute ou de peur lors de l'exercice de mes fonctions, vous ne décèlerez donc jamais de cette hésitation criminelle en moi. Je suis prêt à administrer la justice de l'Empereur au cœur des ténèbres. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne y Glaito irradian una confianza férrea, como encarnaciones vivientes del deber y el orden.{/n} «La doctrina del Adeptus Arbites dicta que renuncie a la duda y el temor en aras de mi servicio, así que no verá en mí ni el más mínimo atisbo de indecisión. Estoy dispuesto a llevar la justicia del Emperador hasta el mismísimo corazón de las tinieblas».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne and Glaito exude steely confidence — both akin to living embodiments of duty and order.{/n} "The doctrine of the Adeptus Arbites commands that I cast aside doubt and fear for the sake of service, so you won't see even a hint of such criminal hesitation from me. I am ready to carry the Emperor's justice into the heart of darkness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne y Glaito irradian una confianza férrea, como encarnaciones vivientes del deber y el orden.{/n} «La doctrina del Adeptus Arbites dicta que renuncie a la duda y el temor en aras de mi servicio, así que no verá en mí ni el más mínimo atisbo de indecisión. Estoy dispuesto a llevar la justicia del Emperador hasta el mismísimo corazón de las tinieblas».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙与格雷托散发着钢铁般的自信。此时此刻，他们宛如责任与秩序的化身。{/n}“法务部的戒律要求我们抛开一切怀疑与恐惧，全心全意侍奉帝国律法。你不会在我身上看到一丝罪恶的犹豫，我会将帝皇的正义带到黑暗的正中心。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne and Glaito exude steely confidence — both akin to living embodiments of duty and order.{/n} "The doctrine of the Adeptus Arbites commands that I cast aside doubt and fear for the sake of service, so you won't see even a hint of such criminal hesitation from me. I am ready to carry the Emperor's justice into the heart of darkness."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙与格雷托散发着钢铁般的自信。此时此刻，他们宛如责任与秩序的化身。{/n}“法务部的戒律要求我们抛开一切怀疑与恐惧，全心全意侍奉帝国律法。你不会在我身上看到一丝罪恶的犹豫，我会将帝皇的正义带到黑暗的正中心。”

languages.text: {n}Vazifenin ve nizamın yaşayan timsallerinden farksız olan Solomorne ve Glaito, çelik gibi bir öz güvenle parlıyor.{/n} "Adeptus Arbites öğretisi, hizmet uğrunda şüpheden ve korkudan arınmış olmayı emreder. Bu yüzden bende böyle suç sayılabilecek bir tereddüdün zerresini bile göremezsin. İmparator'un adaletini karanlığın kalbine taşımaya hazırım."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne and Glaito exude steely confidence — both akin to living embodiments of duty and order.{/n} "The doctrine of the Adeptus Arbites commands that I cast aside doubt and fear for the sake of service, so you won't see even a hint of such criminal hesitation from me. I am ready to carry the Emperor's justice into the heart of darkness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne ve Glaito çelik gibi bir öz güvenle parlıyorlar. İkisi de görevin ve düzenin yaşayan timsalleri gibi.{/n} "Adeptus Arbites öğretisi, hizmet uğrunda şüpheden ve korkudan arınmış olmayı emreder. Bu yüzden bende böyle suç sayılabilecek bir tereddüdün zerresini bile göremezsin. İmparator'un adaletini karanlığın kalbine taşımaya hazırım."
